## IReadonlyLookupByPath interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The readonly component of `LookupByPath`<></>, to simplify unit testing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IReadonlyLookupByPath<TItem extends {}> extends Iterable<[string, TItem]> 
```
**Extends:** Iterable&lt;\[string, TItem\]&gt;

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[\[Symbol.iterator\](query, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath._symbol.iterator_.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Iterates over the entries in this trie.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[entries(query, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.entries.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Iterates over the entries in this trie.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[findChildPath(childPath, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.findchildpath.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Searches for the item associated with `childPath`<></>, or the nearest ancestor of that path that has an associated item.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[findChildPathFromSegments(childPathSegments)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.findchildpathfromsegments.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Searches for the item associated with `childPathSegments`<></>, or the nearest ancestor of that path that has an associated item.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[findLongestPrefixMatch(query, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.findlongestprefixmatch.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Searches for the item for which the recorded prefix is the longest matching prefix of `query`<></>. Obtains both the item and the length of the matched prefix, so that the remainder of the path can be extracted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[get(query, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.get.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Retrieves the entry that exists exactly at the specified path, if any.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getNodeAtPrefix(query, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.getnodeatprefix.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Retrieves the trie node at the specified prefix, if it exists.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[groupByChild(infoByPath, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.groupbychild.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Groups the provided map of info by the nearest entry in the trie that contains the path. If the path is not found in the trie, the info is ignored.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[has(query, delimiter)](./lookup-by-path.ireadonlylookupbypath.has.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Determines if an entry exists exactly at the specified path.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
